settings.title: About Us
settings.content: Our designs are made from 100% genuine leather that is durable and treated to age beautifully. Each belt develops a patina over time that makes it perfectly imperfect and uniquely yours.

settings.title: Newsletter
settings.content: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive exclusive offers & discounts

settings.title: Boldly accents every outfit with an eye-catching metallic or patent leather tip.
Gives new meaning to the classic leather belt with its exposed stitching.
Defining elegance with two of the finest quality Italian leathers in one belt.
BEST SELLER LEATHER BELTS FOR MEN AND WOMEN
Our story
settings.content: Add your own custom content to explain your processes...

settings.section: Based in SoHo, New York, our leather belts style is inspired by the concrete jungle. Like the city that shaped us, our customized belts possess a distinct combination of sophistication and boldness. Each leather belt is handcrafted from premium leather and punctuated with our trademarked custom tip.

settings.title: BICOASTAL MEN
settings.content: 100% Italian cowhide leather belt meets Saffiano leather at just the tip. One of our most popular custom leather belts.

settings.title: EXOTICA MEN
settings.content: Punctuate your outfit with the exotic flair of our Exotica designed with an alligator embossed leather tip. One of the best mens leather dress belts you can buy.

settings.title: EAST MEETS WEST MEN
settings.content: A new spin on Western style. Get belted in The East Meets West Belt, designed with luxurious pony hair leather at just the tip.

settings.title: FIRST CLASS MEN
settings.content: Rich, sophisticated leather belt with exposed stitching. A new defintion of classic. If you're looking for a mens casual leather belt, you've found the right one.

settings.title: MOGUL MEN
settings.content: Boldy accent every outfit with The Mogul designed with an eye-catching metallic or patent leather tip.

settings.title: JET SET MEN
settings.content: Introducing The Jet Set designed with a buttery soft denim tip as comfortably stylish as your favorite pair of denim.

settings.title: DOUBLE AGENT MEN
settings.content: The Double Agent defines classic Italian leather craftmanship at its best.

settings.title: BICOASTAL WOMEN
settings.content: Defining understated elegance with two of the finest quality of Italian leathers in one belt. 100% Italian cowhide belt tipped with a Saffiano leather edge. One of the finest custom leather belts on the market.

settings.title: EXOTICA WOMEN
settings.content: Punctuating every outfit with an exotic flair. Its intricate alligator embossed tip is a detail to be noticed. This makes a great womens dress belt for going out.

settings.title: EAST MEETS WEST WOMEN
settings.content: Our spin on traditional Western style. Get belted in The East Meets West Belt, designed with luxurious pony hair at just the tip.

settings.title: FIRST CLASS WOMEN
settings.content: Rich, sophisticated leather with exposed stitching. The First Class Belt gives new meaning to a classic womens casual belt.

settings.title: MOGUL WOMEN
settings.content: The belt that boldly accents every outfit. The Mogul is designed with an eye-catching metallic or patent leather tip.

settings.title: JET SET WOMEN
settings.content: Like slipping into your favorite pair of jeans. Introducing The Jet Set designed with a denim tip that effortlessly works with any look.

settings.title: DOUBLE AGENT WOMEN
settings.content: Simple luxury with a sleek silhouette. Introducing The Double Agent Belt.

settings.title: JET SET MEN
settings.content: The custom leather belt you'll want to live in like your favorite pair of denim jeans. Our casual leather belts are like no other.

settings.title: BICOASTAL MEN
settings.content: Our #1 best-selling men's italian leather belt designed with premium Saffiano leather tip. Jet Set is one of our best selling casual belts. A great accessory for your wardrobe.

settings.title: FIRST CLASS MEN
settings.content: An everyday essential for casual belts. The First Class leather belt is perfected with exposed stitching around its edges.

settings.title: EXOTICA MEN
settings.content: The Exotica. Because you've got a statement to make. Do it with an alligator embossed leather tip.

settings.title: EAST MEETS WEST MEN
settings.content: When simple doesn't cut it. The East Meets West combines 100% Italian leather with the softest premium pony hair at just the tip.

settings.title: MOGUL MEN
settings.content: Designed for the style mogul. Choose your Mogul with a black patent leather, gold metallic or silver metallic tip.

settings.title: DOUBLE AGENT MEN
settings.content: Premium classic leather belt designed to perfection, upholding the highest Italian craftmanship standards.

settings.title: MOGUL MEN
settings.content: Handmade leather beltslike nothing you've worn before. Designed with shiny black patent leather or your choice of metallic tip.

settings.title: BICOASTAL MEN
settings.content: Adding to your satorial splendor, this best-selling men's leather belt is tipped with premium Italian Saffiano leather available in three rich classic colors.

settings.title: DOUBLE AGENT MEN
settings.content: The finest in classic men's Italian leather belt.

settings.title: EAST MEETS WEST MEN
settings.content: Dress up your style with something truly unique. The East Meets West Belt designed with luxurious pony hair leather tip.

settings.title: FIRST CLASS MEN
settings.content: A timeless classic leather belt designed to complete any look.

settings.title: EXOTICA MEN
settings.content: When turning heads is part of your style game. Show off your exotic alligator embossed tipped leather belt.

settings.title: JET SET WOMEN
settings.content: Denim that fits every waistline. Versatile, flattering and livens up any casual look with its colored denim tip, making it one of the best casual womens leather belts on the market.

Discover the luxury of handmade 100% Italian cowhide leather belt accented with the finest Saffiano leather tip. Durable, high resistant and a true classic custom made leather belt. This is one of our best selling womens casual belts for sale.
Geniune 100% Italian leather belt with subtle exposed stitching details. It makes for one of the best women's leather belts for jeans.
For a head-turning exotic detail, discover The Exotica designed with an alligator embossed tip. Great belt to wear with jeans or other casual attire.
Made from the finest pony hair dyed in black, bordeaux or brown for a luxurious touch of flair at the tip of your womens casual belt.
Made for the style mogul. Available with shiny black patent leather or shimmering metallic tip.
The premium classic leather belt that's anything but ordinary. Handcrafted to perfection from 100% high-quality Italian cowhide.

settings.title: MOGUL WOMEN
settings.content: Add a touch of glamour with The Mogul handcrafted leather belt tipped with shiny patent leather or shimmering metallics.
The best of both worlds for womens leather belts. 100% cowhide leather meets Saffiano leather at the belt tip.
Our classic leather belt made from 100% premium Italian cowhide leather so luxurious good enough to dress up any outfit.
Redefine elegance with a monotone leather belt paired with a smooth, luxurious pony hair tip.
Available in four rich colors, The First Class is a spin on the classic leather belt with its exposed stitching.
Make a bold statement with a finely detailed alligator embossed tipped leather belt.
